Original:

The service staff is proud.When the Italian noodles were on the table, the temperature was insufficient, the face was softened, and it was more greasy after cold.The sandwich is beautiful but can only be eaten separately.Drinks are normal but the price is high.
There is definitely a better choice at such a price!

EN: There are taste stores, there are also catering areas, and the background garden does not have the mood. There are also aromatic massage oils, and there are also small cultural and creative substances. The service personnel are professional and kind and polite.

Original:
另空間換了Dears Cafe來經營，餐點和之前的另空間一樣不太多，以為專業餐廳經營的口味和品質應該更好吧。給兩顆星的理由：一星給沙拉和義大利麵的鹹食類、一星給空間和氣氛。

扣三星的原因：（1）茶太貴：以為$200多的「紅玉紅茶」應該是現泡的原葉茶，沒想到卻是早已泡好、茶湯上面有泡泡、味道像是微甜的「麥香紅茶/泡沫紅茶」，一點都喝不出來紅玉獨有薄荷味的蜜香，太奇怪了。泡沫紅茶我只願意付$30（2）甜點水準低：鬆餅煎好送上桌每片焦黑，讓人超傻眼！（3）服務生訓練不足：不會隨時注意客人需求，一直在櫃檯和廚師們聊天、或是非常專心忙自己的事、服務的敏銳度不高。

最後結帳我和朋友平均一人$900多，品質和價格不成正比。附近任何一家小吃店或是百貨餐廳都比Dears優很多，不會再去第二次了。
EN:
In addition, the space has been changed to operate. The meal is not as much as the previous space. It is better to think that the taste and quality of professional restaurants should be better.Reasons for two stars: one star gives salad and Italian noodles, and one star gives space and atmosphere.

The reason for the deduction of Samsung: (1) Tea is too expensive: "Red Jade Black Tea" that thinks of more than $ 200 should be the original bubbles of the original leaf tea, but I did not expect it to be made of bubbles on the tea soup. "Mai Xiang black tea/foam black tea", can't drink the red jade unique mint flavor at all, it is strange.Bubble black tea I only want to pay $ 30 (2) The level of desserts is low: muffins are fried and sent to each table of burnt black, making people super dumbfounded!(3) Insufficient waiter training: Do not pay attention to the needs of guests at any time. They have been chatting with chefs at the counter, or they are very interested in their own affairs and their sensitivity.

Finally, I checked the average of more than $ 900 with my friends, and the quality and price were not proportional.Any nearby snack bar or department store is much better than Dears, and will not go to the second time.

Original: 氛圍安靜舒適~

Original: 空間氣氛真的很棒~但價格頗高的餐點令人非常非常失望。說得出口的有名品牌，但非常不新鮮又如何(>﹏<),冰淇淋有冰箱怪味，蛋糕不知放幾天了?重點是跟廚子反應了，他聽到後不做任何反應處理…該fire了！
EN: The space atmosphere is really great ~ but the high -priced meal is very disappointed.The famous brand that is exported, but what's not fresh (> ﹏ <), the ice cream has a refrigerator strange flavor, the cake has not been put on for a few days? The point is to react with the chef. Fire!

Original:
❖環境與STYLE：外觀看起來是服飾店，沒想到在裡面有一個如此漂亮的用餐環境，極簡歐風、高雅、有設計感的氛圍很好，採光佳、植栽美、蠶繭吊燈有創意，開放式廚房也頗有新潮感，挺適合貴太太們來場下午茶。
❖食物：點心與飲料表現皆不錯，但要價不便宜，單純的果汁就要200元，還需另收服務費。
❖服務：服務還算親切，但如果不收服務費會更好。
EN:
： Environment and Style: The appearance looks like a clothing store. I did not expect that there was such a beautiful dining environment in it. The minimalist European style, elegant, and designed atmosphere was good. The open kitchen is also quite trendy.
Food: Dim Sum and drinks are good, but the asking price is not cheap. The simple juice will cost 200 yuan, and the service fee is required.
切 Service: The service is quite kind, but it will be better if you do not charge the service fee.
